news.title: US trade court blocks Trump's sweeping tariffs. What happens now?
news.summary: The Trump administration lodges an appeal against the ruling shortly after it was announced.

news.title: Elon Musk leaves White House but says Doge will continue
news.summary: Musk's exit comes after he criticised the legislative centrepiece of the president's agenda.

news.title: Gaza warehouse broken into by 'hordes of hungry people', says WFP
news.summary: Video footage shows crowds breaking into the warehouse and taking bags of flour and cartons of food.

news.title: Government fast-tracks two new reservoirs to shore up water supply
news.summary: Changes to planning laws could speed up projects, but experts warn water consumption will also need limiting.

news.title: Starmer to liken Farage to Truss in policy attack
news.summary: The PM's comments suggest the prime minister sees Farage as his principal political adversary.

news.title: Tears and heartbreak over tragic story of South African girl sold by her mother
news.summary: Joshlin Smith's mother, branded the "mastermind" in her child's disappearance, is to be sentenced.

news.title: The Papers: 'Â£123m down the drain' and 'Better than a slap'
news.summary: Thames Water faces a major fine and France's president cosies up with his wife on Thursday's front pages.

news.title: Fleeing US deportations, it took this family three tries to enter Canada
news.summary: Migrant Araceli and her family hoped Canada offered safety from President Trump's immigration crackdown, but claiming asylum proved a challenge.

news.title: Golden eagles soaring south back to English skies
news.summary: Golden eagles reintroduced to southern Scotland start to spread their wings back into English skies.

news.title: Moment man lights himself on fire in botched arson attack
news.summary: Newly released CCTV captures a man's failed attempt to set a restaurant alight in Melbourne, Australia last year.
